label: PreventiveAction
comment: An adjustment, such as a change to an organization's processes or products, taken to prevent non-conformities or other undesirable situations, possibly as a result of a risk analysis.

datatypeProperties.comment: A type, expressed as text, for this corrective action.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

referencedBy.comment: A preventive action applicable to this specified inspection result.
